pull.title: UPnP
pull.body:
This allows UPnP mapping via miniupnpc when USE_UPNP is set.  
miniupnpc must be installed as a system library to compile with it.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: Automatically map port 8333 on the default UPnP Device via miniupnpc.
Add -noupnp option and a couple small improvements.
make UPnP support optional (at build time)

miniupnpc should NEVER have been copied into the repo.
Use system libminiupnpc.

Make USE_UPNP really optional.
Update build instructions.
Be a bit more clear in the build instructions for Unix.

events.body: Again my lacking of understanding of standard policy means this needs closed and resubmitted.
